context: Open-pit mining operation implementing autonomous haul trucks to improve productivity and address labor shortages

request.purpose: Deployment of 25 autonomous haul trucks and supporting autonomous operations center
request.justification: Address skilled labor shortages and improve operational efficiency in 24/7 mining operations

decision_process.outcome: Identified 40% productivity improvement potential with autonomous operations
Selected proven autonomous system with 99.8% uptime in mining environments
Developed comprehensive workforce transition with 80% job retention

business_impact.expected_outcome: 45% increase in hauling efficiency, reduced operational costs
business_impact.projected_value: $15 million annual savings through improved productivity and reduced accidents

lessons_learned: Comprehensive workforce planning and union collaboration critical for successful autonomous technology adoption, phased implementation reduces operational disruption
